初始环境搭建
npm install -g gatsby-cli. gatsby new hello-world "starter's url" cd hello-world gatsby develop
Bash
组件间传值
import React from "react" import Header from "../components/header" export default () => ( <> <Header headerText="About Gatsby" /> </> )
JavaScript
import React from "react" export default props => <h1>{props.headerText}</h1>
JavaScript
内部链接的跳转
import React from "react" import { Link } from "gatsby" export default () => ( <> <Link to="/contact/">Contact</Link> </> )
JavaScript
💡
外部链接，也可以使用，不过官方建议使用 a 标签
全局样式
通过样式文件添加全局样式
src/styles/global.css
html {background-color: lavenderblush;}
CSS
gatsby-browser.js
import "./src/styles/global.css" // or: require('./src/styles/global.css')
JavaScript
💡
多数情况下, 我们使用 layout 组件添加全局样式
通过 layout 组件添加
src/components/layout.css
div {background: red;color: white;}
CSS
src/components/layout.js
import React from "react" import "./layout.css" export default ({ children }) => <div>{children}</div>
JavaScript
src/pages/index.js
import React from "react" import Layout from "../components/layout" export default () => <Layout>Hello world!</Layout>
JavaScript
或者另一方式：
src/components/layout.js
import React from "react" export default ({ children }) => ( <div style={{ margin: `3rem auto`, maxWidth: 650, padding: `0 1rem` }}> {children} </div> )
JavaScript
src/pages/index.js
import React from "react" import Layout from "../components/layout" export default () => ( <Layout> <h1>Hi! I'm building a fake Gatsby site as part of a tutorial!</h1> <p> What do I like to do? Lots of course but definitely enjoy building websites. </p> </Layout> )
JavaScript
组件作用域样式
src/components/container.js
import React from "react" import containerStyles from "./container.module.css" export default ({ children }) => ( <div className={containerStyles.container}>{children}</div> )
JavaScript
console.log(styles) 可查看生成的样式对象
需要同一目录下：src/components/container.module.css
.container {margin: 3rem auto; max-width: 600px;}
CSS
src/pages/about-css-modules.js
import React from "react" import Container from "../components/container" export default () => ( <Container> <h1>About CSS Modules</h1> </Container> )
JavaScript
CSS-in-JS
微型教程：EmotionStyled Components
使用 Emotion
Emotion 具有2 个可选的包，每个有不同的方式添加样式
npm install --save gatsby-plugin-emotion @emotion/core @emotion/styled
Shell
module.exports = { plugins: [`gatsby-plugin-emotion`], }
JavaScript
import React from "react" import styled from "@emotion/styled" import { css } from "@emotion/core" const Container = styled.div` margin: 3rem auto; max-width: 600px; display: flex; ` // Using css prop provides a concise and flexible API to style the components. // const underline = css` text-decoration: underline; ` export default () => ( <Container> <h1 css={underline}>About Emotion</h1> </Container> )
JavaScript
结合使用 emotion 与 tailwindcss
npm install tailwindcss --save-dev npm install --save tailwind.macro@next
Shell
import React from "react" import styled from "@emotion/styled" import { css } from "@emotion/core" import tw from "tailwind.macro" const SiteTitle = styled.h1` ${tw`text-2xl`}; ` const underline = css` ${tw`text-2xl`}; color: #fb7299; ` export default () => { return ( <> <SiteTitle css={underline}>abccc</SiteTitle> </> ) }
JavaScript
使用 typography 添加全局样式
npm install --save gatsby-plugin-typography react-typography typography typography-theme-fairy-gates
Shell
gatsby-config.js
Gatsby将自动识别的一个特殊文件。
在这里添加插件和其他站点配置
module.exports = { plugins: [ { resolve: `gatsby-plugin-typography`, options: { pathToConfigModule: `src/utils/typography`, }, }, ], }
JavaScript
src/utils/typography.js
import Typography from "typography" import fairyGateTheme from "typography-theme-fairy-gates" const typography = new Typography(fairyGateTheme) export const { scale, rhythm, options } = typography export default typography
JavaScript
Once you load the site,if you inspect the generated HTML using the Chrome developer tools,you’ll see that the typography plugin added a <style> element to the <head> element with its generated CSS
GraphiQL
GraphiQL是GraphQL集成开发环境（IDE）。
构建盖茨比网站时经常使用的功能强大（功能强大）的工具。
http://localhost:8000/___graphql
Ctrl + Space 或 Shift + Space 调取自动提示
Ctrl + Enter 运行 GraphQL 查询
允许通过单击可用的字段和输入来交互式构建完整查询
数据层
如果要构建的是小型站点，则构建站点的一种有效方法是使用createPages API提取非结构化数据
如果该站点以后变得更加复杂，可以继续构建更复杂的站点，
想要转换数据：
1.
查看插件库，查看要使用的源插件和/或转换器插件是否已经存在
2.
如果不存在，阅读《插件创作指南》考虑构建自己的插件
网站通用数据
gatsby-config.js
module.exports = { siteMetadata: { title: `Title from siteMetadata`, } }
JavaScript
页面组件获取数据
import React from "react" import { graphql } from "gatsby" import Layout from "../components/layout" export default ({ data }) => ( <Layout> <h1>About {data.site.siteMetadata.title}</h1> </Layout> ) export const query = graphql` query { site { siteMetadata { title } } } `
JavaScript
非页面组件获取数据
使用 Gatsby 的 StaticQuery API
useStaticQuery
import React from "react" import { useStaticQuery, Link, graphql } from "gatsby" export default ({ children }) => { const data = useStaticQuery( graphql` query { site { siteMetadata { title } } } ` ) return ( <Link to={`/`}> {data.site.siteMetadata.title} </Link> ) }
JavaScript
通过数据源插件获取数据
